Text: Artificial intelligence, or AI, involves creating machines capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence. Machine learning, a key part of AI, allows systems to learn from data without explicit programming, improving their performance over time. AI powers applications like self-driving cars, medical diagnosis tools, and personalized recommendations, transforming various industries. Ethical considerations surrounding AI bias, job displacement, and autonomous weapons systems are crucial for responsible development. The rapid advancement of AI necessitates ongoing research and discussion to ensure its beneficial and safe integration into society.
title: Understanding Artificial Intelligence

sentences.sentence: Artificial intelligence, or AI, involves creating machines capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence.

AI powers applications like self-driving cars, medical diagnosis tools, and personalized recommendations, transforming various industries.
